description:
Imagine Freeware Image & Animation Viewer for Windows

Imagine is a free, lightweight image and animation viewer for Windows, known for its minimal resource usage, extensive format support, and fast performance even on legacy hardware. It combines essential viewing tools with batch processing capabilities in a compact package.

Key Features:
- Support for digital camera RAW image file formats: 3FR, ARW, CR2, CRW, DNG, ERF, KDC, MRW, NEF, ORF, RAF, RAW, SRW, SR2
- Support for numerous archive file formats: ZIP, RAR, 7Z, ALZ, HV3, CBZ, CBR, CB7
- Image manipulation software
- Support for high dynamic range image file formats: HDR, EXR, SXR, MXR
- Extract single/all frames from animation files
- Show detailed information of image/animation files
- Show Exif/IPTC information
- Show or hide transparency
- Multilingual support
- Thumbnail browser
- Color corrections
- Color management (ICC Profile)
- Batch conversion
- Slide show
- Batch rename
- Capture screen
- Tiled view
- Create animations
- Create multiple page images
- Create panorama images
- Manipulate and edit images
- Customizable shortcuts for Keyboard and Mouse
- Command line parameter support
- Shell extension support
- Add-on plugin support
v2.3.0, Oct 25 2025
- Added: ARM64 version available
- Added: 'Edit' button in metadata information dialog
- Added: Save without re-encoding for JPEGs with no pixel changes
- Added: Support for comment metadata information
- Added: Support for some non-standard BMP formats
- Fixed: IPTC attribute is not added in the column tab of browser preferences
- Fixed: '*' does not appear in the window caption for modified file
- Fixed: Rewritten ZSoft PC Paintbrush encoder/decoder
- Fixed: Some XPM errors
- Fixed: Some Flic errors
- Fixed: Some skins cannot be applied
- Fixed: Error loading zip file thumbnail in Total Commander Lister plugin
